name: Borbo's Quest
description:
Borbo's Quest is a short adventure game in which you play as Borbo, a 10 year-old kid set on a quest to retrieve their stolen birthday cake. Journey through a charming puzzle-filled world to track down Nasty Cake Jake and retrieve your precious cake.

Borbo's Quest is built using the GBStudio open-source engine and runs on the original Game Boy. Alongside the in-browser version of the game, a ROM file is included and can be played on the Game Boy emulator of your choice.

Controls:

  • A - Confirm/ Interact (Z key on keyboard)
  • B - Cancel (X key on keyboard)
  • Start - Menu (Enter key on keyboard)

Credits:

  • Stephen Kerschbaumer - game design, art, writing
  • Drake Tuura - music
  • Jamie Garcia - playtesting
